content:
Military doctors conducted a successful operation and seized a ball of 7.62 mm caliber from the leg of the Ukrainian defender.

About thisinformsCommand of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

"The foreign body was successfully removed and the limb was saved!" - The message says.

According to doctors, the patient is currently felt consistently and is preparing for further medical evacuation and treatment.

“We thank the medical professionals of all medical evacuation units for tireless service. Despite all the difficulties associated with active fighting on the front, you are always on the guard of life! ” - added to the command.

As reported by the Armyinform, military doctorsThey gotFrom the body of the wounded warrior part of the explosive element from the GPO-17 grenade.
title: From the knee of the wounded warrior military doctors got a ball of 7.62 mm caliber
description: About it reports the command of the medical forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. “The foreign body was ...
author: Army Inform
